title: GET_NUMBER_OF_PED_COLLECTION_PROP_DRAWABLE_VARIATIONS
content:
0x3B6A13E1// GetNumberOfPedCollectionPropDrawableVariations
int GET_NUMBER_OF_PED_COLLECTION_PROP_DRAWABLE_VARIATIONS(Ped ped, int anchorPoint, char* collection);Parameters:ped: The target pedanchorPoint: One of the anchor points from SET_PED_PROP_INDEXcollection: Name of the collection. Empty string for the base game collection. See GET_PED_COLLECTION_NAME in order to list all available collections.Returns: Number of props available in the given collection. Returns 0 if ped or collection does not exist.An analogue of GET_NUMBER_OF_PED_PROP_DRAWABLE_VARIATIONS that returns number of prop variations inside a single collection instead of the total number across all collections.
codeBlocks:
// GetNumberOfPedCollectionPropDrawableVariations
int GET_NUMBER_OF_PED_COLLECTION_PROP_DRAWABLE_VARIATIONS(Ped ped, int anchorPoint, char* collection);
